tossup_question: 7) CHEMISTRY  Identify all of the following compounds that will dissolve in water in an endothermic fashion: 1) ammonium nitrate; 2) sodium hydroxide; 3) sulfuric acid.
bonus_question: 7) CHEMISTRY  What law in physical chemistry, important in reaction thermodynamics, states that the total enthalpy change of a reaction is the sum of the enthalpy changes of each step of the reaction?
